titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that certain cash rentals of farmland will not cause recapture of the special estate tax valuation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/28/1995--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that cash rental of farmland to a member of the decedent's family for a qualified use will not cause recapture of the special estate tax valuation.
